attributes.action: Stop the privatisation of OUR NHS
attributes.additional_details:
The NHS is something that the uk should be incredibly proud of, I would hate to imagine living in a country where someone couldn't get the health care they need because they don't have enough money. This nightmare could come true if we don't stop the governments reform plans concerning the NHS. By the time the next generation are old, we might not have our treasured NHS to lean on.

The value of the NHS is immense and cannot be mirrored by the private sector. It must be kept in public hands, serving the interests of all patients and the broader public, not the private healthcare industry.

Illness should never be exploited for money.

KEEP OUR NHS PUBLIC.

rejection.details: Please see: Suspend the privatisation of the NHS
